general.standard_conclusion: Standard Companion's gameplay is pretty straightforward: you utilise his skills to get buffs while adapting your gameplay based on the standard weapon you have chosen.

artist.paragraph: [Resonance Skill] and [Support Skill] create [Scarlet Shade] and [Flame Lily] which inflict [Burn] for 5s. After consuming 10 [Flame Lilies], Rafayel gets an ATK buff for 10s and additionally his attack range is also increased. To create more [Flame Lilies] and trigger the [Passive Skill] faster you can use a high-speed weapon like [Hunter Firearm].

artist.summary: Collect [Flame Lily] ⇨ Get ATK buff + range increase

fresh_paint.paragraph: [Charged Attack] and [Support Skill] inflict [Tinctus] stacking it up to 5 times. Detonate them, dealing ATK DMG based on the number of stacks and restoring HP to both of you. Detonating 5 stacks reduces enemy DEF by 20% for 5s. To inflict more [Tinctus], use high-speed weapon like [Hunter Firearm].

phantom_of_the_siren.paragraph: [Support Skill] leaves behind [Reprise] which reduces enemy movement speed by 50% for 5s. Using [Support Skill] after triggering [Passive Skill] leaves [Echo] which increases the DMG dealt to enemies by 10% for 5s. To utilize it faster, use high a speed-weapon like [Hunter Firearm].

echo.caption: Echo circle caused by Rafayel's Passive Skill + Support Skill

abysswalker.paragraph_1: Abysswalker has a special skill called [Potential]. It requires 6 stacks.  You can find it under the HP bar.
abysswalker.paragraph_2: You can collect those by using a [Charged Attack] when you see a [Beacon] on the enemy or by collecting a [Fishtail Beacon] that appears after using a [Support Skill]:
abysswalker.paragraph_3: Triggering [Potential] by collecting all 6 stacks consumes them and increases CRIT Rate by 15% for 5s and allows Rafayel to deal big DMG to an enemy.
abysswalker.paragraph_4: You can also see buffs being applied on your [MC] above your HP bar and his buffs near his icon:
abysswalker.paragraph_5: For Abysswalker there's no actual rotation but in a nutshell:
abysswalker.li_3: after [Support Skill], wait for [Beacon] to collect
abysswalker.li_4: use [Resonance Skill] to pull enemies (and break the shield)

god_of_the_tides.paragraph_1: Your main priorities with God of the Tides in the battle are:
god_of_the_tides.li_1: Building [Faith]: attack with [MC], Rafayel and [Sea Spirits]
god_of_the_tides.li_2: At full [Faith] triggering [Heavenly Rain] (+30% DMG, [Sea Spirits] levels up)
god_of_the_tides.li_3: [Active Skill] (CRIT Rate [Tidal Field], stay inside it)
god_of_the_tides.li_4: [Basic Attack]s + [Support Skill] + [Perfect Dodge] (To create as many [Sea Spirits] as possible and restore [Faith])
god_of_the_tides.paragraph_3: Remember to time your main sources of DMG with enemies' shields which can only be broken by [Resonance Skill]. You can always check if buffs are active above your HP bar and near his icon.
god_of_the_tides.paragraph_4: [Sea Spirit] has 3 levels. Their level can be increased by [Passive Skill] and at Rank 1:
god_of_the_tides.li_6: does DMG based on ATK + HP.

lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_1: Lemurian Sea God may seem quite complex at first but his rotations are quite straightforward and improve with Ranks.
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_2: Your gameplay is centred around [Sea God Mark] and his special state. When a [Charged Attack] empowered by [Sea God Mark] hits an enemy, it reduces the [Support Skill] cooldown by 1.5s.
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_3: He has two states: normal and [Divine Favor] which can be activated by reaching [Ocean's Descent]. To activate it you need to perform [Basic Attack]s and [Active Skill] to fill the yellow part of the bar. To full Rafayel's white part of it you should click on his icon when his [Support Skill] is up and to trigger it faster, you can perform a [Perfect Dodge].
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_4: When [Ocean's Descent] is full, a button will appear. When triggered, it will change the state to  [Divine Favor] for 11s. In this state, Rafayel will throw lightning. And you are the main star right now!
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_5: Consuming [Sea God Mark] is greatly empowered in this state. Additionally, [Active Skill]  will generate [Lightning Crystal], dodging right into it will detonate it dealing massive DMG and restoring 0.3 ◆  also reducing [Active Skill] cooldown by 3.3s! When state ends, any remaining [Lightning Crystal] will detonate automatically.
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_6: Usually you are able to make the rotation 3 times during the [Divine Favor], with Ranks it is possible to do up to 4!
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_7: So the whole rotation will look like this:
lemurian_sea_god.ul_li_1: [Resonance Skill] + use MC's [Basic Attack] & [Active Skill] to stack (don't consume [Sea God Mark] too close to state change) + Rafayel's [Support Skill] +  [Resonance Skill]  ⇨
lemurian_sea_god.ul_li_3: consume [Sea God Mark] + [Active Skill] leaves behind  [Lightning Crystal] + dodge into it (repeat till the end) ⇨
lemurian_sea_god.paragraph_8: If you have time between  before [Sea God Mark] restorations you can do [Basic Attack]s.
